mapper.sql: M.ID, M.CHANNEL_ID, M.RESERVE_AMT, M.RESERVE_TYPE, M.RESV1, M.RESV2, M.RESV3, M.RESV4, M.RESV5, M.RESV6, M.DATA_STAT, M.REMARKS, M.CREATE_USER , M.UPDATE_USER, M.CREATE_TIME, M.UPDATE_TIME, M.LOCK_VERSION
mapper.select: SELECT , C.CHANNEL_NAME FROM TB_TEL_CHANNEL_RESERVE_DETAIL M, TB_TEL_CHANNEL_INF C WHERE M.CHANNEL_ID = C.CHANNEL_ID AND M.DATA_STAT = '0' AND C.DATA_STAT = '0' AND M.ID=#{id}

SELECT , C.CHANNEL_NAME FROM TB_TEL_CHANNEL_RESERVE_DETAIL M, TB_TEL_CHANNEL_INF C WHERE M.CHANNEL_ID = C.CHANNEL_ID AND M.DATA_STAT = '0' AND C.DATA_STAT = '0'
AND C.CHANNEL_NAME LIKE '%' || #{channelName} || '%'
AND M.CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId}
ORDER BY M.UPDATE_TIME DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( ID, CHANNEL_ID, RESERVE_AMT, RESERVE_TYPE, RESV1, RESV2, RESV3, RESV4, RESV5, RESV6, DATA_STAT, REMARKS, CREATE_USER , UPDATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, LOCK_VERSION ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, sysdate, '0')
mapper.update: UPDATE SET CHANNEL_ID=#{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE_AMT=#{reserveAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE_TYPE=#{reserveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESV1=#{resv1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESV2=#{resv2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESV3=#{resv3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESV4=#{resv4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESV5=#{resv5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESV6=#{resv6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_STAT=#{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS=#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME=sysdate, LOCK_VERSION=LOCK_VERSION+1 WHERE LOCK_VERSION=#{lockVersion} AND ID = #{id}
